tool_description: This API/Scraper allows you to access publicly available information from ThriftBooks.com.  You can retrieve data from a URL, perform keyword searches, and obtain details using the ISBN.
name: ThriftBooks
title: ThriftBooks

api_list.name: Extract URL (Search Results, Author Page, Book Details Page)
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to extract the data from ThriftBooks.com.
It accepts: Search Results URL, Author Books URL, Book Details URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Must be on of the following: Search Results URL, Author Books URL, Book Details URL.

api_list.name: Book Details By ISBN
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get the book details using the ISBN.

api_list.name: Search Results By Keyword
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get search results using a keyword.
